resources.string: In this application if you paste any proper youTube link you will get downloadable video(.mp4) and audio(.mp3). After paste your link if you click MP4 Converter button you watch the link created video and if you click on videos 3 dot get a download option.This download option helps you to download the full video(.mp4) with 360p(640X360,Videos at 360p are well-suited to smartphones and other mobile devices since they use up less data,but may appear a bit blurry on larger screens.) on your phone\'s downloads folder for this reason you access this video in anywhere of your mobile. Similarly to MP3 Converter button. But here the download option helps you to download the full audio/music(.mp3).If your mobile cannot start this audio file ,please download Music player app from Play store and then open the audio file. You also can set the audio as ringtone or alarm song. So I thing you can enjoy with this app, thank you.
